dc:title: RPI shuttle data
dc:creator: Zachary Fernandes
dc:subject: Dataset
dc:description:
A dataset collected on when shuttles arrived at the Rensselaer Union, how long they took, and how many people boarded
Data collected:
Date - date information was recorded in ISO 8601 Time - time shuttle entered circle in ISO 8601 (time zone: Eastern Time, UTCâˆ’05:00) Shuttle Number and Direction - see Shuttle Number and Shuttle Next Direction Shuttle Number - number of shuttle (ID) Shuttle Next Direction - next route shuttle will take People - how many people board the shuttle Stop Time - time from door opening to door closing (ISO 8601) Time Since SNS - time for same shuttle to return (deprecated from previous methodology) SNS = Same Number Shuttle
dc:coverage: data collected during most weekdays during the week of 2022-09-26
dc:provenance:
Origin - Zachary Fernandes, Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute student Owner History - Zachary Fernandes, Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute What - data collected on when shuttles arrived at the Rensselaer Union, how long they took, and how many people boarded Where - data collected at the closest red table to the right of the north entrance of the Rensselaer Union When - data collected during most weekdays during the week of 2022-09-26
Why - Shuttle Tracker underperforms at tracking shuttles, observing when shuttles arrive at a popular stop like the Union may help understand how the shuttles operate How - observation from the Union, recording data into Google Sheets when shuttles arrive, saving data as a CSV, using ISO 8601 for times
